See the CEN website: www.cen-neurologie.fr where videos are available

question.question: What is the typical presentation of Ramsay Hunt's syndrome?
question.option_a: A vesicular eruption of the concha in favor of zoster viral PFP
question.option_b: A zoster viral infection of the facial nerve
question.option_c: A typical example of a vesicular eruption of the concha in favor of zoster PFP
question.option_d: A zoster viral infection of the concha
